String ssTitle = 'ssName';
List<JBCXM__Report__c> ssList = [Select id from JBCXM__Report__c where JBCXM__Title__c=: ssTitle limit 1];
	System.Debug('Count is:'+ssList.size());
	List<String> reportSectionTitles = new List<String>{'Section Header Slide Title','Title Slide Title','Title and Content Slide Title', 'Two Content Slide Title', 'Comparision Slide Title'};
	Decimal d = 1.0;

	List<JBCXM__ReportSection__c> pbr11 = new List<JBCXM__ReportSection__c>();
	for(Integer i=0;i<reportSectionTitles.size();i++){
		JBCXM__ReportSection__c viewObj11 = new JBCXM__ReportSection__c(
			JBCXM__Report__c = ssList[0].id,
			JBCXM__Title__c = reportSectionTitles.get(i),
			JBCXM__DisplayOrder__c = d
		);
		pbr11.add(viewObj11);
		d = d+1.0;
	}
	insert pbr11;
